gameplay.description: Passive An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.  Passive Whenever Abomination bleeds, his irradiated blood has an 87% chance to Poison the enemy for 55% of his attack over 10 seconds.

signature.name: Irradiate
signature.description: Contact with the Abomination's gamma-irradiated body has chance to Poison the target.

2.name: Sonic Boom
2.description: Abomination lets loose his rage and unleashes a savage beatdown on his opponent.

3.name: Gamma Bomb
3.description: What the Abomination hits into the air, the Abomination hits back down.

attack.description: All Attacks 10% chance for Fury, increasing your Attack by 45% for 5 seconds.

description: When Russian spy Emil Blonksy exposed himself to gamma radiation, he was transformed forever into the monstrous Abomination! Bigger than the Hulk, the Abomination retains his cunning and intellect – but cannot return to his human form. Enormous, powerful, and angry, the Abomination is a fearsome foe – even to one as strong as the Hulk!
